name: ROBERT COOPER
summary: Safety conscious, attentive Security Guard with eight years experience in protecting and guarding VIP individuals in the military and defense sectors. Proficient at observing surroundings and immediate settings for possible threats of nonhuman and human nature. Presently finishing a bachelor's in criminal justice and qualified as a CPO (Certified Protection Guard). Achieved significant reductions in theft (up to 93%) and unauthorized entry (26%) by implementing vigilance strategies, enhancing detection and monitoring procedures with advanced CCTV and X-ray scanning systems, and improving access control.

experience.title: Security Guard
experience.description: Responsible for completing reports by recording information, observations, occurrences, and surveillance activities, including interviewing of witnesses and acquiring signatures. Maintained environments by monitoring the grounds and equipment controls. Logged into security headquarters on the hour during the day and every 2 hours with the night shift, notifying control of all in order statuses. Utilized armed force when necessary, to protect company belongings, visitors, employees, and clients when needed. Apprehended suspects in the event of security breaches and detained them until the police arrive on the scene.

experience.title: Security Guard
experience.description: Primary purpose was to scan area of grounds for objects/items that seem out of place and notifying Center management of bags or packages that are unattended. Inspected restrooms after closing time for vagrants/unauthorized personnel. Monitored selected areas via CCTV app on smart devices. Ensured flawless equipment operation by finishing preventive maintenance necessities, reading the manufacturer's instructions, troubleshooting malfunctions, organizing for repairs if needed, and assessing new equipment and techniques.
